snippet.title: Ways of Alchemy | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Become a medieval alchemist in this card game. Grow, craft, and brew your way to power. Hire adventurers, discover ancient recipes, and master the art of alchemy. No wands are required — just wit and wisdom.

Play the demo and wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2915380/Ways_of_Alchemy/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=alchemist&utm_content=youtube-trailer-description-wishlist-link

Follow us for updates:
— Discord: https://discord.gg/QMzDEwE
— X: https://x.com/TheUnlivingGame
— Facebook: https://www.reddit.com/r/WaysOfAlchemy/
— Reddit: https://www.facebook.com/theunlivinggame/
— TikTok: http://tiktok.com/@rocketbrush_games/
